website_summaries.verdict: A cleverly designed flexible mister that can be used in a number of fun and cooling ways.
pros: The FlexCobra connects directly to your hose or hose bib for a lightning fast set up
It can be twisted to the perfect height and direction for your particular needs
cons: By design, this item only covers a limited area as all three nozzles are located in the same place

customer_reviews.title: Great mister for 1-3 people
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mister. I love that you can bend it to your will! We wrapped it around a tree and it kept 3 people comfortable. Great for laying out in the backyard too! I really bought to help keep the dogs cool, but they have yet to use it. If you found this helpful, please hit the helpful button. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dewitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mister!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little mister is absolutely perfect for laying out in the sun. I always find myself out for a half hour and then I'm absolutely dying from the heat. Found this for $15 and was the absolute best investment for my summer. No leaks or anything and came packaged nicely. Cant speak for longevity yet but will update if it doesn't last. Honestly the only downside is you can't chose the color you want which I dont care that much but it would have been nice. Overall would most certainly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooling black chickens! (And me too!)
customer_reviews.text: Here in Oklahoma it gets really, really hot. I have black backyard chickens who were really looking like they were suffering, so I bought this mister for use in the chicken pen to cool the area for them. It has worked like a charm! They chickens are now up and about, scratching and digging and clucking, and they are obviously more comfortable. I've noticed a tremendous difference in the temperature. I bought two of these, and I am glad I did. I use one for the chickens and the other one I use for myself. They work great, sort of like a swamp cooler. I wish I had bought them years ago. Yeah, it makes that much difference!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Works just as I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I had seen some comments about it being difficult to shape but it seriously took me less than 5 min to shape it. I've had it in the grass and on pavers and stands just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A refreshing light mist for small area
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for misting my 8x12 patio. It sprays a refreshing fine mist - just enough to cool off without getting wet. It’s really flexible - I have twisted it on to the framing of my cantilever umbrella for a nice gentle mist from above .... muy bueno!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Byron

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as the best reviews day it does!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yesterday and it arrived today. Followed the easy instructions, rinsed it quickly and set up how I wanted it. Instantly cooler! 😎 awesome standing position. It is cooling me off as I write. I would like to thank those who have it a great review!!! THAN YOU! It is perfect for my needs and seems built to last. That is my foot in the picture. I 💘 it
customer_reviews.author: Jay.

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing 😔
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited about this product, but it needs a major redesign. 1- every time you want to use it, you have to unscrew your hose spray nozzle and reattach this product. It’s a very stiff material, so it is not very easy. 2- You must screw this product onto your hose INSANELY tight for it not to leak, which makes taking it off at the end of each use, VERY difficult. Had to use a heavy duty wrench. 3- there’s no on/off switch or valve like a spray nozzle, so every time you want to use it, you have to turn On/off the water from the source. We ended up returning it
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got this!
customer_reviews.text: I got this mister for my hot, Arizona yard. I bought it about 8 months ago, and used it through most of the summer. It was stored in the garage over the winter. I just got it back out and two of the mister heads are clogged (likely due to the incredibly hard water here--I have to clean out sink and shower heads on a regular basis). One of the heads is still working well, but for $15, being plastic, being in the AZ sun, it is holding up well and I think it will last through at least another season with minor replacements of the little heads.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: A summer must have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to have for those that want to cool off in the heat without getting soaked (i.e. in a pool) I've used similar products in the past but they were not flexible such as this one. It's not flexible enough to bend at a tight angle but enough to adjust the head to better suit your needs. My previous ones cracked due to improper storage for the winter, so be sure to drain it completely and keep in a garage, shed or house before the freezing temps hit. The kids love playing in it as well and uses much less water than running other sprinkling toys.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great, user-friendly sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked the sprinkler up, so I can’t speak for how long it will last. However, it is very easy to use and hook up. I bought it for my kids to use on the trampoline. They would normally use a water hose and handle sprayer which left huge mud puddles under the trampoline and they had trouble finding a way to hang it. This sprinkler was the perfect solution. My 11 year old daughter took it and bent it around the ladder herself. It sprays broad enough that there’s no puddle yet, but it’s keeping them and the trampoline cool and wet! Probably going to buy at least one more and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Riley

customer_reviews.title: a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I had a great, cheap mister from a big box store. I brought it to a sweltering party this summer and since I was leaving early I just left the mister behind for others to enjoy. I bought a replacement at the same box store and it truly sucked. No mist, just dripping. I checked this one out on Amazon and purchased it. Days later after raving about the mist production and the fact that you can nudge it into any shape I bought 2 more for my mom and her friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: One misting head, a little overwhning
customer_reviews.text: Says it comes with 2 misting heads, wrong. It comes with one misting head and one flower one that just pours water out, not at all like a mister. I like this mister but the other problem is that it just sends out so much mist my patio is drenched so now I'm trying to figure out how far away I need to put it not to drench the patio but then you don't really get the mist in the area you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: New favorite patio toy
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite patio toy. Perfect for hot summer days. Helps keep the flys at bay. My sister wants one now. Item sells itself. I did notice a less expensive similar item at Home Depot but the quality was not nearly as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: First time use.. Luving it..
customer_reviews.text: First time use and I'm actually a little cold in 93° heat! I like that I got a grey one and not green or something.. Look forward to using more. New face down lounge chair to use with it from Wally World... I'll get back about durability.. Might get one for the chickens!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: GENIUS
customer_reviews.text: This thing is genius. Best invention I've come across. I LOVE laying in the sun and getting a tan but can never sit in the baking sun for more than 5 minutes before having to use my hose to cool off. NO MORE. Now I just point this mister on me in my chair and I can sit there for hours. So I guess it could be dangerous for your skin, but just use more SPF!
customer_reviews.author: hewlew

customer_reviews.title: Great item with quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this and use it on any hot day to mist into different gardem areas, hopefully also providing a mist bath for our summer hummingbirds. Sadly, by the end of the first week, the mister end was clogged and apparently, for good, as we have tried everything to clear it. We now use a different, heavier hose end mister which throws this item put of balance, forcing me to have to work much harder to keep it in balance and stay standing. If the original mister head had continued to work, this would be a five star review as everything would be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Poppie

customer_reviews.title: Best summer accessory out there!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has saved summer! Keeps me cool on mist while working in the garden or tanning in the yard. This kids are loving the mister AND easy to swap out sprinkler head I didn’t even realize came with it. I rarely write reviews but since I’ve been using this every day I figured I should!
customer_reviews.author: K. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fabulous. My daughter loves to play outside and I melt easily. With this and an umbrella, we can enjoy outside playtime and not overheat! I did have to make sure the bottom was formed into a circle to be able to stand straight. No but deal, it it still plenty tall enough. I like that it’s a rigid flexible hose. Once you bend it into shape, it stays. It puts out a good amount of mist, too. My husband said we should order a second for when it gets really hot.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Auge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in mist
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. The mist doesn't reach very far, maybe 6 inches. I tried both nozzle heads and it didn't make a difference. And it's more water than a mist as I was very wet sitting under it. I was hoping to put it at my feel when laying out and getting a mist to my full body length butit just isnt strong or powerful enough. I also tried sitting it between 2 people and neither felt it in that case.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie whitis

customer_reviews.title: Bend it to free-stand or wrap around a pole.
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time. Sent me blue, my favorite color. The mist cools you down. Just the perfect amount of water so you don't get soaked unless you're right up to it and stand there for long period of time. You will dry off so who really cares. You're keeping cool and that's what you want. If it's breezy it will determine the direction of the mist but, where we have it will get you wherever you sit on our little deck. Don't be holding your phone or eating while enjoying it. Works perfect. Smartest purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fail :(
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work right out of the box. I was so happy to get it too and couldn’t even use it. Checked for clogs, attached it to three different hoses using different water pressure options and nada. Just drips from each nozzle. So disappointed. Ended up getting a $5 sprayer hose attachment that has a mist option and a bracket to leave it running. Works great and allowed me to tan without feeling so hot. Wish I would have gone that route to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Code Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure what to think initially. It’s a really hard plastic hose and connectors which makes me think I’m going to break it when bending, or that it won’t last very long. I could be wrong but the overall product and quality/value for cost is not what I expected. It mists ok but I’m not sure it’s well suited to what it’s marketed for (personal cooling).
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great mister!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these Orbit 10360 FlexCobra Three Nozzle Misters. These Misters were bought for the birds. I feel so sorry for them when it is so hot! They seem to enjoy these misters. I put it close to the bird bath and they enjoy the cool mist! Especially the little hummingbirds! i think this wood also work well with my plants and for me to cool off in the summer temperatures!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic summer glamping accessory
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a desert camping trip. We wen't sure if the pool would be open due to, you know, the pandemic the shall not be named. Sure enough there were time restrictions for the pool. We bought a splitter so we could share the RV water spigot with this mister and it was heavenly. It's a super fine mist and if you sit at just the right distance (5 ft.) it will cool the area around you by at least 15 degrees. It is flexible and can be rolled up to pack away. 10/10 would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ACH84

customer_reviews.title: Good Affordable Mister
customer_reviews.text: This is very cool. It’s sturdy and the most is very fine yet refreshing. Great for a hot day if you don’t wanna get soaked or can’t jump in a pool. But I’m confused by the “second attachment” flower? It literally just spits out fat streams of water. Not sure if it’s defective or not but it’s definitely not usable.
customer_reviews.author: IvyScissor

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the reviews before wasting my money on this. It was awkward to get it adjusted to the perfect angle once the hose was attached. It worked okay the first time. Second time I went to use it, after throwing away the packaging, water only came out of two of the little brass nozzles. Even at that, the water wasn’t coming out too well. It didn’t matter what I did, I couldn’t get the water to come out of the one tiny nozzle. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Roxsann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful water toy
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, it seems durable and it's easy to adjust the height. I like that the kids can get good water fun out of this without getting drenched and it's a good alternative to other water toys that consume A LOT of water since it's a mister. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amie A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun mister
customer_reviews.text: I suppose you could use this to mist your garden, but when you have an 8-year-old in need of cheap fun, this works great for that too! The whole thing is flexible, but of course you have to set it up to balance otherwise it's more of a garter snake than a cobra, if you know what I mean. Grandmas sitting in lawn chairs appreciate it too. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and more convenient than buying a pool to keep cool !
customer_reviews.text: This works beautifully. So glad I bought it! It's so convenient ~ makes a hot day on the deck enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: teddg

customer_reviews.title: Sprays harder than a mist
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Works almost too well. I really get wet when this is spraying on me while sunbathing. Wish it was more of a fine mist. Even tried turning down the water flow from the hose but it’s either off or spraying pretty hard. I don’t mind since I’m wearing a bathing suit, but wanted to make others aware if they’re planning on putting this on a deck where you or guests will be fully clothed.
customer_reviews.author: CaraS

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Arizona and was having a pool party for my son's birthday in May when the temperature was already reaching close to 100 F. I bought the first one and tested it. It worked so well that I ordered two more before the party. I placed them around the sitting area for the adults who were not using the pool and it was a big hit. Highly recommend it! Easy to use. Just attach them to your garden hose and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: AngelicaInWonderland

customer_reviews.title: Well built!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Super easy to use and it works great for cooking a small area. I love that it’s flexible so you can wrap it around things. We wanted to use it on the trampoline so we wrapped it around one of the poles holding the net and it cooled the kids off while they were jumping. Seems sturdy and we’re glad to have it!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product! PROS: ZERO CONS: -Product Arrived 2 weeks late -Product was green -Product leaked at bottom connection -Product leaked at top connection -Only 1 of 3 misting nozzles worked -Product is Unsteady -Low Quality -Hard to Return, Just threw it out -Unable to use even once -Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: #TheJessOfAllTrades

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I like to suntan outside on my back patio and got this so I could stay cool in the 100 degree heat we have. It was worth every penny. I got the gray one (hoping for blue...) I should let you know that it can cool 2 people down easy but you have to remember the mist depends on how hot it is outside and the wind. On the super hot days, the mist didnt go very far unlike the 90 degree days but I'm very happy with mine. I should mention, you will need to clean.wipe those little nossel heads down so they dont shoot a solid stream.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to get wet.
customer_reviews.text: This works nice when I'm laying out in the sun but I bought it for my patio to cool things down and enable us to spend more time outside. I did not like the way it gets water on everything. In a swimwear, great. In street clothes, not so great.
customer_reviews.author: carrie j mclean

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for a hot day
customer_reviews.text: This mister is super cool. No pun intended. It came with two nozzles so you can either have the water spray like a sprinkler or mist. The structure allows you to move it and adjust the size and it stays standing the entire time. I was pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Wickersham

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Sonoran desert (Southern Arizona) where it gets very hot in the summer. I keep one of these running 24/7 for my hens in the summer. Some will just sit under the mist until they cool off. Even hummingbirds will dart in and out of the mist to bath. With our extremely hard water these only last through the summer but will probably last longer with softer water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really cool the air.
customer_reviews.text: This operated ok. I haven't had any problems with any nozzles clogging. It is pretty rigid plastic yet at the same time it is bendable. Unfortunately it really doesn't really cool the air. If you sit next to it and let it soak you you may feel cooler. I bought this for my chickens. They are afraid of it. It's the same color as the garden hose. They think it's a snake.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Brizek

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t recommend this at all. Worked the first time and never again. Cleaned all the heads, descaled, did everything but it leaks around the screw on piece and the little heads just act plugged. Didn’t last a week. Not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: amy hayden

customer_reviews.title: Gets you pretty wet
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could set this in front of a fan to disperse cooled air toward an area I wanted to cool, didn't work, heavy wet mist just makes everything wet. Not sure how many times you might be able to bend the tubing it is made of before it may become unusable however it seems well made and uses orbit misting heads. If you are looking for a fine mist that will not soak you I doubt you would like this device.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Chicken Spa Bliss
customer_reviews.text: The girls were listless and barely eating in the 98 degree heat until I turned on their new mister! They perked up almost immediately and I left it on into the evening, as they were happily enjoying their dinner. It wet the ground inside their run...but not a lot, and they were enjoying the cool wetness on their feet. I could see the relief on their little chicken faces. They love their new spa!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little personal mister
customer_reviews.text: This mister gives me a chance to relax outside when the hot summer heat is keeping me inside. I've used it spraying over me in my hammock and just relaxing in a chair. It will get you a little wet so I usually put a pair of my swim shorts on. We just turned the heat down on our spa and sat in it like a small pool with the mister spraying over us in 106 degree weather. It was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Of clogged soak nozzle in vinegar for three minutes and tap on hard surface
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mister. After storing it in the garage during the cold months it would not work. But a quick google search suggested to tap the nozzle on a hard surface or soak in vinegar for three minutes to remove mineral deposits. That worked! My kids like to set it up pointed along the sidewalk and they ride their bikes through it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: This is an awful product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. First day I bought it it worked, next time only one or two of the little mister holes worked. Not sure what is wrong but have unscrew top and screw back on numerous times and still not all 3 misters work. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is fun! Bought for my kids because the normal water hose is “too cold”. First day of hooking it up it was difficult to get them out from in front of it. Could probably get more sales if it was marketed with kids running in front of it. I would buy again and again. I think everyone needs one of these for the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: NurseSue

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This free standing mister is exactly what I wanted ! I can stand it up alone, twist it loosly onto a chair or swing it over a low hanging tree limb. I put my fan behind it to scatter the mist further. It is great for a quick cool off after weed eating. Keeps me cool while I sit and read as long as I'm not close enough to get my Fire tablet I'm a happy avid reader. The price is perfect also.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! So much I bought two more for my kids animals.... Mine if for my Rottweiler when she is outside on the patio. I bought one for my sons huskies while they are at work to cool off in this heat and bought for my other son for his dogs, or they can try for their chickens. I'd give more stars if I could... Ready right out of the box, just need to pull to shape (takes a minute)... love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler not a mister
customer_reviews.text: Return window is too small. This is not a mister- it is a sprinkler !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis Lecker

customer_reviews.title: Our Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Living in Texas is very hot so we decided to help cool things down on our patio....never guessing that our dogs were going to keep cool too (they hate the sprinklers!) I have one that lays in front of it all day and 1 that walks by and stands next to it! Probably one of the best investments we ever made ! You don't get soaked sitting anywhere near it so highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mommio83

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you so COOL!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got this out of the box and turned on, I was instantly cooled down. In full sun, in Deep South Summer heat! It works great and hardly uses any water.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Orbit 10360 FlexCobra connects to the hose nicely. As for the misting part of it
customer_reviews.text: The Orbit 10360 FlexCobra connects to the hose nicely. As for the misting part of it, it is a complete fail. It just seems to drip water. It is flexible and you can position it the way you want. I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best if put up high
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our yard- We wrapped it up in the tree so it's hidden and sprays out over our patio. It didn't work well sitting on the ground, so we put it up higher and it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice fine mist!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I managed to get a hose hooked up on my balcony and this thing is my “pool” for the summer. It makes a fine mist when combined with a fan, feels like air conditioning outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: d-unit

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to be cool by the pool
customer_reviews.text: After sitting outside sweating with an other parent friend as we watched the kids swim I knew I would either have to enter the pool of meyhem, splashing, jumping and chaos or get this mister. I got the mister. It works. Pretty fine mist given off. It lowers the temperature quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Like: super fine mist, flexible yet firm, holds position, in stock, perfect for the 97 degree weather we’ve been having Dislike: the type of plastic used for the hose connect Bonus: extra misting head in the shape of a flower... perfect for starting a daycare
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Summer necessity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer!! Don't know what we would do without it considering it gets up to 110 degrees where I live!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor/patio fun for children
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our kid's birthday party. They are 3 and 4 yrs old and loved playing in the mist. It did get them pretty soaked after a few minutes, but it was hot and they dried fast, then came back for more. It is pretty sturdy, so they can't just break it, which is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cool!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the 3 misters could be adjusted or turned off because 3 so close to each other really dampens an area. Hard to get to stand up on its own. Durability still to be tested.. works good on a tree branch or wrapped around an RV. The flower is silly and I have not installed it yet. Worried the plastic will crack when bending in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch K.

customer_reviews.title: worked once then misters all clogged and it’s useless
customer_reviews.text: it worked once then the misters clogged up and it’s useless. i tried using it today for just the 2nd time and already it doesn’t work, 2 days after the return window. i wanted to email the company but their website is very user unfriendly and there was no link to email company so basically you’re stuck with a useless product that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: ca

customer_reviews.title: Good mist but not as bendy as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I do like that it is a fine mist, nothing is dripping or getting soaking wet. It is also very simple, all you have to do is attach it to the hose. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s not as bendable as I expected. I was hoping to cool it up the side of my awning post but it still needs to be propped up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light mist for personal use or for small plants
customer_reviews.text: Love the fine mist. Perfect to just mist my feet and legs on a cool evening after a 100 degree day. Just what I was looking for. Glad I decided to buy the 3 nozzle cobra rather than the 2 nozzle. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Love the spray but it gets clogged easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the spray but it gets clogged easily. I guess we have really hard water. It sprays a gentle mist while I’m tanning outside. When I go to use it the next day, nothing comes out. It has to be soaked in vinegar to remove the calcification. When it works, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as advertised - very very light mist
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute idea. However it does leak from the connector, even when I added a washer inside. It is a very, very light mist and although you "can" flex it into different shapes, it only really stands by itself if it is in this one shape. For multiple kids to enjoy this, I would need to buy several or only one kid can stand in front of it at a time and feel anything. Did not break for us after a summer of medium use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After the first use, one of the three sprizters on the flower head no longer worked. So now the mist is not as full-range. It also doesn’t stand on its own - I have to weigh it down at the bottom so it will remain upright no matter how I twist it’s position. The picture is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: anabanana

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep my dog cool in the hot AZ summers. It works well and holds up to the heat sun and my dog running into it well. It got 4 stars instead of 5 because the spray nozzles get clogged easily and require Maintainance to keep it at a mist instead of a stream.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: gets clogged quickly
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a month. I was using it almost daily to help my chickens keep cool and then the flow became a dribble. The heads that create the mist must have gotten blocked inside of the ports somehow. We tried to clear it, but the ports are so small it seems impossible. This product is fine if you only use distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mister to put in my chicken area. We live in Texas where the summer heat is unbearable at times. The mister did fine for about a month, maybe less before no mist came out. I soaked the mister head in vinegar to get out any mineral deposits. That didn’t help. I tried inserting a sewing pin in the openings on the sprayer head with limited success. The sprayer was good for about a day and then it quit for good. Not very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry O

customer_reviews.title: Great mister, difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiness of the pipe used to make this free standing mister makes it very difficult to bend into whatever shape I need it to be in for a particular misting need. Once you get there it works great. Not much if anything could possibly break on it.
customer_reviews.author: KOBAM

customer_reviews.title: Leaks right around the head. More water leaks than comes through the mister.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked it up, and it leaks around the misting head. More water is leaking out of the joint of the head connection to the hose piece itself than makes it through the mister. It's not the head to hose connection itself so swapping to the other head won't help, it's where the connection piece is attached to the hose to receive the head.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harnum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Relief From the Heat
customer_reviews.text: Flexible, yet very sturdy. A little tough to bend (I am in my 50s and my hands and fingers have lost strength), but it stays put how you bend it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: Love the mister except for the smell. There is this plastic, unpleasant smell that the water gets going through the mister. Hoped it would get better with use but it hasn’t. Tried using vinigar and dish soap, but the smell remains. Otherwise the mister is perfect if your like to lay on the sun, or sit on a hot deck. Keeps you nice and cool.
customer_reviews.author: FinnDog

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: this is great on a hot summer day! cools off everyone without getting really wet. The second attachment is more like a sprinkler which the kids love as well. We originally found out about this at someone else's party and then bought one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jjones1008

customer_reviews.title: I didn't feel like putting up our pool this year so I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel like putting up our pool this year so I was trying to find a way to still keep wet and cool. I finally decided that I would give this Orbit mister a try. Very easy to hook up. It doesn't leak (a big plus). The biggest drawback seems to be that even on the calmest day, a slight change in breeze and the mist is gone away. I found I had to have my hand on the cobra and move it as the wind changed. Overall it does keep you wet and cool as long as you can keep the mist focused on you. The price is high for this item...should be worth about $10.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C. Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Great just what I was misting in my life 😉
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up and puts off quite a lot of mist! I almost wish I could change the most level
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: perfect for tanning
customer_reviews.text: perfect for tanning outside, it is super easy to move around and direct anywhere you want it to go. kept me cool while tanning... altho put a timer on yourself, you will not realize you are gonna burn ! love this !!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good spray, poor strength.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these misters and the first two broke. They spray really well if you want to spray one area but they are very week where they connect to the hose. If you try to aim them or bend them they break at the connection if they are connected to the faucet. The only one that hasn't broken is connected to a hose so when I move it there is more give at the base.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Noticably lowers temp
customer_reviews.text: Works great for chickens during hot weather. Chickens don't love water, but ours conglomerate in front of this thing because it lowers temperature several degrees. Keeps them from panting and stroking out from heat. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed my mom!
customer_reviews.text: I was setting this up on my deck and though, lets try the flower end. DON'T do that when your mom is in front of it! The flower end is not a mist end! Other end is and works great. It's very stiff but you can bend it to get it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: AN2010

customer_reviews.title: two of the three holes were un-drilled
customer_reviews.text: I suppose if I wanted to I could of popped the little brass disks that were blocking the mist holes but it also leaked around the fasteners. Although I like the part where you could wrap it around a pole or stand on it's own
customer_reviews.author: Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Mist
customer_reviews.text: Mist only come out of one nozzle, other two just produce big drips. Tightened the, loosened them, nothing works to get the other two producing mist. The amount of mist one produces is ... okay. Bought this to use while tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S Massey

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely mists! Don’t need to turn hose on too high. I can see how it might explode because it’s under so much pressure. When we turned off hose, it goes for another 10 mjnures or so. Don’t use it over anything that you don’t want to get wet. (It’s water y’all.) Easy to maneuver and point in any direction. May buy another! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Moonjatao

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big mess!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried to use this a few times now and every time it makes a big mess. The mist is not fine enough to drift in the breeze, so anything close gets wet. Also, the head leaks water. I will return it if I can. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Starman

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to bend but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but a little difficult to get it to bend and stay in that position. Like the fact that it comes with two different spray nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Metro

customer_reviews.title: Great for my rabbit in the cage
customer_reviews.text: We live in a hot area and the mister is for the rabbit to cool her off. It puts out to much water, more of a stream and not a mist. So we run it off and on just a few minutes at a time or else everything is soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great to cool the air down on a hot evening in AZ. It is adjustable in height but tippsy. We secured it with bricks so it could stand better. Good amount of spray. Move anything not waterproof 3 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Schiljord

customer_reviews.title: gets everything wet
customer_reviews.text: If you're by the pool or the back yard, this is the ticket for a HOT day! If you're on the porch hoping for that gentle mist, oh honey, every thing gets WET especially if there isn't a breeze to move the mist.
customer_reviews.author: mdc

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: After trying several ways of using this, we set it up HIGH in the patio and added a fan. Turn the water on very, very little and a light mist (with the fan) fills the patio. Otherwise, everything gets wet if water is full blast
customer_reviews.author: NancyHutch

customer_reviews.title: Functional and good function
customer_reviews.text: This sits perfectly on a table on my patio. I attach a hose and the misting head provides a fine mist to cool off the area. With the flower head it can be used to water several potted plants. Easy to mold into shape. Happy with putmrchasr.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Flickstein

customer_reviews.title: It worked on hottest day of this year!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver. We had an outdoor reunion with temps reaching into 90’s. I set this up high so people could walk through the mist or sit under it, and with a faint breeze, it worked like a breeze! Great flexible tubing to customize to your own needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot days
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Perfect for those hot days when you're not by the pool. The mist is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Millz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cooling mist.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Went back to buy another one 2 days after I received my first and it was 29.00. I got it for 12$.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Super weak, only covers about 3 square feet. Also, only 2 out of the 3 tiny mister nozzles worked on mine.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: A sprinkle system for adults!!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this flex sprayer this past Summer. We set it up and the breeze sent droplets of cooling water among us sitting/working outside without the hose being directly sprayed on us. It was reminiscent of running through the sprinkler when we were kids!
customer_reviews.author: LadyJane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the kids and us to cool off in the summer. It is easily put on to hose and light weight. We have set it up by the swings for kids to swing "thru" the mist and we have set it up on the patio for just a mist on hot nights.
customer_reviews.author: A. Showman

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, works but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this hose attachment, and technically it works. But it is extremely stiff, difficult to bend so that it doesn't fall over, and 1 of the 3 mist spigots was broken upon arrival so it drips. Still worth having, just not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarbs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item is so perfect. It's flexible and can be put almost anywhere. The mist is just the perfect amount. It's been 100 degrees and over where I live , so I frequently have this on. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bazinett

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I like to set outside and when it's too hot this is great to have misting me. It is bendable to sit and spray in the direction you want. The mist is very fine and not bothersome to me yet it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...Small Suggestion
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cobra Mister and use it every summer. My only suggestion to the manufacturer / designer would be to add an on / off switch on the mister so you don’t have to keep getting up to turn it off / on at the spigot.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the summer heat
customer_reviews.text: Have been spending more time outside this summer due to lockdown, and this mister makes the heat more bearable. Easy to set up, *mostly* easy to use. The only thing preventing 5 stars is that it can be filddly to get it to 'stand up' while it's in use. All in all though, worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This was the second personal mister I bought. I thought I needed two because the first one I bought was not strong enough.Then I bought this one and it works so well with a strong mist that keeps me just cool enough to lay in the sun (in the desert of Southern Nevada). I absolutely love this personal mister and wish I found this one first.
customer_reviews.author: OLB4W3

product_meta.title: Orbit 10360 Flex Cobra Portable Mist Stand (Colors May Vary)
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1The Orbit Flex Cobra Mist Stand has a flexible design that allows for customized direction and applications for your mist cooling. The Flex Cobra will make mist cooling easy with its freestanding, portable and flexible features. Included with each item is an interchangeable flower misting head for a fun, quick decorative look. The versatility of the Flex Cobra allows for watering or misting in virtually any position or situation. The Flex Cobra is designed with ALL of your misting needs in mind.
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE COOLING: Cools the surrounding area up to 20 degrees
CUSTOMIZABLE SHAPE: Freestanding and pliable, so you can manipulate it to fit a variety of different shapes and heights
PORTABLE: Flexible mist stand can be used anywhere there is a standard 3/4-inch outdoor hose faucet
DECORATIVE FEATURE: Comes with an interchangeable, flower-shaped misting head to add some fun and whimsy to hot summer days
INCLUDES: 3 brass and stainless steel misting nozzles for the perfect misting spray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,263 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
